CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Solar cell devices were fabricated according to the structure ITO / PEDOT : PSS / photoactive ( polymer : PC 70 BM ) / TiO 2 / Al.

Let's think step by step.

1. ITO: Indium Tin Oxide
2. PEDOT : PSS: Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene):poly(styrenesulfonate)
3. photoactive: Not a material name, but a property or function of the device.
4. polymer: Not a specific material name, but a category of materials. In this context, it refers to PC 70 BM.
5. PC 70 BM: Poly(3-hexylthiophene-2,5-diyl-alt-[6,6]-phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester)
6. TiO 2: Titanium Dioxide
7. Al: Aluminum.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. ITO: Indium Tin Oxide
2. PEDOT : PSS: Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene):poly(styrenesulfonate)
3. PC 70 BM: Poly(3-hexylthiophene-2,5-diyl-alt-[6,6]-phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester)
4. TiO 2: Titanium Dioxide
5. Al: Aluminum.

These are the material names mentioned in the paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Indium Tin Oxide (ITO) |
| Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene):poly(styrenesulfonate) (PEDOT : PSS) |
| Poly(3-hexylthiophene-2,5-diyl-alt-[6,6]-phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester) (PC 70 BM) |
| Titanium Dioxide (TiO 2) |
| Aluminum (Al) |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Solar cell devices were fabricated according to the structure ITO / PEDOT : PSS / photoactive ( polymer : PC 70 BM ) / TiO 2 / Al.

Let's think step by step.

1. ITO: Indium Tin Oxide
2. PEDOT : PSS: Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene):poly(styrenesulfonate)
3. photoactive: Not a specific property name, but rather a descriptor for the next entity.
4. polymer: Not a specific property name, but rather a type of material. In this context, it refers to the photoactive material, which is PC 70 BM.
5. PC 70 BM: Poly(3-hexylthiophene-2,5-diyl-alt-[6,6]-phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester)
6. TiO 2: Titanium Dioxide
7. Al: Aluminum.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. ITO: Indium Tin Oxide (property: conductive coating)
2. PEDOT : PSS: Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene):poly(styrenesulfonate) (property: conducting polymer)
3. PC 70 BM: Poly(3-hexylthiophene-2,5-diyl-alt-[6,6]-phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester) (property: photoactive polymer)
4. TiO 2: Titanium Dioxide (property: semiconductor)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Indium Tin Oxide (ITO) |
| Conducting polymer: Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene):poly(styrenesulfonate) (PEDOT : PSS) |
| Photoactive polymer: Poly(3-hexylthiophene-2,5-diyl-alt-[6,6]-phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester) (PC 70 BM) |
| Semiconductor: Titanium Dioxide (TiO 2) |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Solar cell devices were fabricated according to the structure ITO / PEDOT : PSS / photoactive ( polymer : PC 70 BM ) / TiO 2 / Al.

Let's think step by step.

1. ITO: Indium Tin Oxide - a type of conductive oxide material commonly used as a transparent electrode in solar cells.
2. PEDOT : PSS: Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene): Poly(styrenesulfonate) - a conducting polymer used as a hole transport layer in organic solar cells.
3. photoactive (polymer: PC 70 BM): Polymer: Poly[2,6-(4,4-bis(2-ethylhexyl)-4H-cyclopentadithiophene-2,6-diyl): 2,7-(9,9-dioctylfluorene)-2,7-bis(ethylhexyl)-fluorenone] - a specific type of photoactive polymer used in the solar cell.
4. TiO2: Titanium Dioxide - a semiconductor material commonly used as a scattering layer and electron transport layer in solar cells.
5. Al: Aluminum - a metal used as a back contact or top contact in solar cells.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. ITO: Indium Tin Oxide - transparency.
2. PEDOT : PSS: Conductivity.
3. PC 70 BM: Optical properties (absorption spectrum).
4. TiO2: Refractive index, Scattering properties.
5. Al: Reflectivity (for back contact) or conductivity (for top contact).

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| Indium Tin Oxide (ITO) - transparency |
| Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene): Poly(styrenesulfonate) (PEDOT : PSS) - conductivity |
| Polymer: PC 70 BM - optical properties (absorption spectrum) |
| Titanium Dioxide (TiO2) - refractive index, scattering properties |
| Aluminum (Al) - reflectivity (for back contact) or conductivity (for top contact) |
